body: Hi Atta, Your weather file didn't have data for ground temperature which was causing the problem. I modified the function to handle cases with no data. If you update Ladybug + Honeybee you should be able to run the analysis with your weather file. [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/rDS2C2Z6uy1Oaromcky3to8alAIC3ET4lDFKfkRlNzT8ktcjI2BE99tHu51B7BiosmLIw4Dj6vQU69e6qHHz2doFU5hH*HHU/epwweatherfile.png) Mostapha
